boone

Class Boone

  • java.lang.Object
    • boone.Boone

  • public final class Boone
extends java.lang.Object
    An automatic registry of qualified class names in Boone. It is maintained and updated at run time.
    Version:
    $Id: Boone.java 2294 2016-04-18 11:38:16Z helmut $
    Author:
    August Mayer, Helmut A. Mayer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Boone()

    • Method Detail

      • getClassPath

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getClassPath()
        Returns the class path used by Boone for class look-up. Only change the list, if you are sure what you are doing.
        Returns:
        a list of paths

      • getFullName

        public static java.lang.String getFullName(java.lang.String shortName)
        Return the qualified name of a class given the unqualified class name using the internal registry.
        Parameters:
        shortName - basic class name
        Returns:
        the qualified class name

      • setFullName

        public static void setFullName(java.lang.String shortName,
                               java.lang.String fullName)
        Adds the mapping to the registry.
        Parameters:
        shortName - basic class name
        fullName - qualified class name

      • getExcludedNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getExcludedNames()
        Returns the strings that cause exclusion of a path to be searched for Boone classes. If an unqualified class name is found in a configuration file, the associated qualified class name is searched in the class path. If an entry in the class path contains an excluded string, then this entry is not searched.
        Returns:
        the list of exclusion strings

      • newInstance

        public static java.lang.Object newInstance(java.lang.String className)
        Create a new instance of the class with the given name. We first try to resolve this string against the Boone registered class list.

        Note that this method uses the current thread's context class loader for unknown (unregistered) classes.

        Parameters:
        className - Basic (if registered) or full name of the class to instantiate.
        Returns:
        Null if the class wasn't found, or couldn't be instantiated.

      • isExcluded

        public static boolean isExcluded(java.lang.String path)
        Indicates if the given path contains an exclusion string. If it does, then this path is not searched for Boone classes.
        Parameters:
        path - a string
        Returns:
        true, if path contains an exclusion string
